clients: IPDJ - Instituto Português do Desporto e Juventude

experience.text:
Faculty of Science and Technologies at the University of Coimbra.

This degree provided a strong foundation in both traditional and digital design, covering areas such as Graphic Design, Web Design and Multimedia.

Throughout the course, I developed critical thinking, problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate ideas visually, with a focus on:

Typography, Graphic Design, Communication Design, Project Methodology, Photography & Composition, Multimedia Programming, Audiovisual Production, Editorial Design and History of Design.
experience.title: Degree in Design and Multimedia — University of Coimbra

experience.text:
Joined The Feeting Room team, a platform representing national and international sustainable and independent fashion brands.

Worked closely with the Consulting Department, developing brand-books, collection presentations, copy and content for social media and websites.

  • Printed materials for stores (acrylics, cards, vinyls, tags)
  • Social media content (reels, short videos, stories, ads)
  • Campaigns (Christmas Edit, Ask Mr. Pinho, Mother’s Day, Black Friday, Sales)
  • Newsletters and giveaways
  • Event materials (invites, stickers, vouchers, flyers)
  • Website management (banners, gifs, product photography)
  • Creative direction and photoshoot assistance
  • Backstage content creation and styling
experience.title: The Feeting Room — Professional Internship

experience.text:
Graphic Designer working on a global scale within the fashion industry.

Responsibilities include visiting fashion factories, presenting new projects, developing brochures and collections, and creating photo and video content for digital platforms.

Worked closely with project managers and marketing teams to develop brand identities, logos, prints, newsletters and blog content, as well as social media management and copywriting.

This role strengthened my skills in visual storytelling, brand development and impactful marketing communication.
experience.title: Deepwear — Global Progressive Fashion Agency

experience.text:
Freelance work with small businesses and entrepreneurs, focusing on brand identity development, printed materials and social media content.

Demonstrated strong attention to detail, effective communication and the ability to deliver high-quality results within defined timelines.
experience.title: Freelance Graphic Designer

experience.text:
Choreographer in entertainment and event animation companies, primarily during the summer season.

This experience enhanced my communication, leadership and teamwork skills.

Background includes 6 years of Ballroom Dance competitions, achieving National Champion titles in Ballroom and Latin styles in 2016 and 2017.
experience.title: Choreographer — Music Beats Events & Groovy Events

experience.text:
Worked in retail while completing my studies, gaining experience in sales, stock management and customer service.

This role contributed to the development of adaptability, problem-solving and interpersonal skills in a fast-paced environment.
experience.title: Sales Assistant — Springfield (Cortefiel Group)

profile.subtitleText: Procuro manter-me sempre a par das novas tendências de conteúdo e de mercado, para ajudar as marcas com que trabalho a acompanhar a evolução das plataformas digitais e offline, através de conteúdos relevantes e apelativos. Gosto de ter um olhar crítico sobre o design e sobre a forma como este performa.
profile.titleText: Olá, eu sou o José Vaz. Sou designer gráfico e creative specialist, o meu trabalho foca-se na criação de conteúdos digitais e campanhas de marketing.
